A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seeing the Audience Score for this film surprises me. Though making a lot of risks unlike past entries in the saga\, this film perfectly captured the complexities of being good or bad\, what it means to be human. I think Fisher would have considered it a great ending to her cinematic career. And\, I think fans need to see the film again and process everything that happens in this film\, because so much does happen and this score seems to be a gut reaction to those things. I mean\, is it really worse that the Prequels? No\, it’s not.
